titles.title: I'm set free, and today I proclaim it,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm set free, and today I proclaim it,
I'm set free by the day of atonement,
I'm set free, I give glory to Thee,
Let me walk and dance into this feast.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am not worthy but I've been set free,
My sins behind me I leave at Calvary,
O Holy Spirit fill and lead me,
Let me walk and dance into this feast.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Seven days, wave your branches,
Seven days, praise and dances,
Seven days to rejoice with joy,
Let me walk and dance into this feast.
